Class Locations

java.lang.Object
com.yelstream.topp.standard.resource.name.Locations
public class Locations extends Object
Utility addressing instances of #Location and classloader resource names in general.
Since:
2025-07-01
Author:
Morten Sabroe Mortensen

  • Field Details

    • ROOT_CONTAINER_NAME

      public static final String ROOT_CONTAINER_NAME
      Root container name.

      Note that this matches ClassLoader semantics.
      This differs from any UNIX inspired style, using "/".

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SEPARATOR

      public static final String SEPARATOR
      Separator of name elements.
      See Also:

    • createLocation

      public static Location createLocation(String name, boolean container)
      Create a simple location.
      Parameters:
      name - Location name.
      container - Indicates, if location name refers to a container.
      Returns:
      Created location. The name of this is always normalized.
